location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP 38 TO ILLUSTRATE THE ACTION OF KHAN BAGHDADI. 26th. March, 1918.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 220 x 305mm, on sheet 276 x 360mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume IV, and shows a region around Khan Baghdadi [Al Baghdādī] in central Iraq, indicating military operations, towns, settlements, routes and watercourses. Form lines give some indication of relief.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in 1927.
